Text: new infoPST Hello from Utah We just launched a new website for EPI check it out wwwecologyprojectorg I have also finally settled into a home for the winter just outside of Moab Utah in a town called Castle Valley The Colorado Green Dolores and San Juan rivers are all close by so please come and spend some river time with us while were here My new contact info is below Take care and let me know how youre doing Julie Julie Osborn Research Director Ecology Project International wwwecologyprojectorg PO Box Moab UT ph fax Ecology Project International EPI is a c organization a project of the Tides Center in San Francisco
